title: Behind The Idea #56: The Forces Behind PG&E's Bankruptcy With WYCO Researcher
description: Since we spoke about PG&E a few weeks ago, the company has filed for bankruptcy and the stock has basically doubled. Those are usually not successive acts in a one-month period, so what's going on? We ask WYCO Researcher, a Seeking Alpha author and expert on bankruptcy proceedings, to walk us through the PCG's fall, the recent stock price rise, and why there's still a lot of money to be lost for shareholders (in his view).
itunes:title: The Forces Behind PG&E's Bankruptcy With WYCO Researcher
itunes:author: Seeking Alpha
itunes:subtitle: A bankruptcy expert looks at the mess PG&E finds itself in and talks about what it means.
